Description:
When Only The Best Will Do!
A true standout from the crowd, this vibrant Carlisle built home is packed with character and panache. Stunningly presented with not a finger to lift, this gorgeous home is ready and waiting to brighten your day! A brilliant investment, fabulous family home or first home for a lucky buyer!
As you walk in you will be pleasantly surprised by the colour tones, quality fitting, fixtures and the floor plan. The wide entry hall flows past the master bedroom and formal lounge continuing through to the open plan kitchen, meals and family area. The large kitchen has stainless steel appliances including gas cooktop, 900mm wide electric oven and dishwasher. Finished with a modern glass splashback, loads of storage space and a brilliant walk in pantry, this kitchen will delight home cooks, proud hostess' and even our budding master chefs.
Comprising of four bedrooms; the master bedroom features a walk in robe and full en-suite with double vanity. The other three bedrooms, with built in robes, are located at the rear of the home with easy access to the main bathroom and separate WC. Further comforts of the home include ducted heating, evaporate cooling, blinds, security doors, pendant lights, high ceilings, CCTV with 4 cameras, alarm system with intercom and easy to maintain gardens. .
Providing additional living and entertaining space, the alfresco is accessed via the meals/ living area and provides the perfect spot for hosting family parties and weekend barbeques. The home is also complimented by a good sized yard and remote controlled double garage.
A home of this calibre that ticks all the boxes is sure to suit most buyers and investors so get in quick!
